tool_description: (DEMO Only) Go to http://rapid.snowpal.com, and subscribe to the real API there.
name: Snowpal: Project Management
title: Snowpal: Project Management

api_list.name: Copy project block
api_list.description:
Copies project block. 
  - If you want to copy all tasks, use the `allTasks` boolean attribute. 
  - You can also copy specific pods using the `podIds` attribute.

optional_parameters.name: targetProjectListId
optional_parameters.description: Specify ID of target project list.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allPods
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all pods should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add comment to teacher pod (as teacher)
api_list.description: Adds comment to teacher pod (as teacher).

api_list.name: Add attachment to teacher pod (as teacher)
api_list.description: Adds attachment to teacher pod (as teacher).

api_list.name: Add standalone event
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/scheduler/standalone-events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add scale
api_list.description:
Adds a scale. A scale can be an alphabetic or numeric scale.
  - An alphabetic scale has a range of values (in a specified order). 
  - A numeric scale has an upper numeric limit.

api_list.name: Copy all pods in project list
api_list.description: Copies all pods in project list. If you want to copy all tasks, set `allTasks` to _true_.

optional_parameters.name: targetProjectListId
optional_parameters.description: Specify ID of target project list.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allPods
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all pods should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Bulk copy pods in project list
api_list.description: Copies one or more pods in project list. If you want to copy all tasks, set `allTasks` to _true_.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: targetProjectListId
optional_parameters.description: Specify ID of target project list.

api_list.name: Copy key pod
api_list.description: Copied key pod. If you want to copy tasks or checklists, set `allTasks` and/or `allChecklists` to _true_.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allChecklists
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all checklists should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add key pod

optional_parameters.name: excludeTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if tasks should be excluded.
- False, otherwise

api_list.name: Add checklist item
api_list.description: Adds a new checklist item (to a checklist).

api_list.name: Add a project pod
api_list.description: Adds a project pod which is essentially a `block pod` in a project key.

Add key task

Add key checklist item

Add block as favorite
Add block pod
api_list.description: Adds a block pod. A block pod is essentially a pod that is nested in a block.

api_list.name: Add block task
Add block note
Add project block list
api_list.description: Adds a project block list (_also referred to as as a Project List_).

api_list.name: Add block comment
Add block checklist
api_list.description: Add a new block checklist. A block can have any number of checklists. And every checklist can include one or more checklist items.

api_list.name: Copy block
api_list.description: Duplicate a block. You can choose to copy all the associated pods, and/or tasks.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allChecklists
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all checklists should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allPods
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all pods should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add block (based on template)
api_list.description:
When you add a block, you can choose to create it based on one of the existing templates. And if you choose to do it, you will need to specify a `template_id`.          
If you do not want to create tasks (_as defined in the template_), set `excludeTasks` to _false_.

optional_parameters.name: excludeTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if tasks should be excluded.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add a block
api_list.description: Add a block in a key. A key can contain any number of (building) blocks.

api_list.name: Add block pod as favorite
Add key as favorite
Add pod as favorite
Add private or group conversation
api_list.description: Creates a new conversation that can either be private, or a group conversation.

api_list.name: Add block pod note
Add block pod comment
api_list.description: Adds block pod comment. A block pod can have any number of comments, and they are available to all collaborators.

api_list.name: Add block pod checklist
Block Pods.1.16: Get pods available to be linked
api_list.description: Returns pods available to be linked to block. A pod can be linked to any number of blocks but a given pod can only be linked once to the same block.

api_list.name: Copy block pod
api_list.description: Copies block pod to destination. You can choose to copy all tasks and/or all checklists associated with the pod.

optional_parameters.name: allChecklists
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all checklists should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

optional_parameters.name: allTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if all tasks should be copied.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add block pod (based on template)
api_list.description:
When you add a block pod, you can choose to create it based on one of the existing templates. And if you choose to do it, you will need to specify a `template_id`.
If you do not want to create tasks (_as defined in the template_), set `excludeTasks` to _false_.

optional_parameters.name: excludeTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if tasks should be excluded.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add project pod (based on template)
api_list.description: Adds a project pod based on template.

optional_parameters.name: excludeTasks
optional_parameters.description:
- True, if tasks should be excluded.
- False, otherwise.

api_list.name: Add key
api_list.description:
Adds a new key based on given type. A key can be a:
  - Custom Key
  - Project Key
  - Teacher Key
  - Student Key

The ACL of a block, key pod and block pod is driven by the type of key.
  - A block, key pod or block pod in a custom key has to be individually shared with collaborators.
  - A block in a teacher or project key can be shared with a collaborator, and all block pods inherit the ACL from the block. Key pods cannot be created in these keys.
  - When a block in a teacher key is shared with a student (by granting them `read` access), it will appear in a student key of that student.

api_list.name: Sign in by email

import requests

url = "https://snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com/app/users/sign-in"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "snowpal-project-management1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
